text: Glad you have been vaccinated.@matthewtrainer Yet  my Mum 81, is a patient QMH and is NOT allowed the jab as she lives in the wrong borough. The jabs are being taken 2 floors where she sleeps. She has been left. Can you put this right? @OxleasNHS @MattHancock #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/7fza7LGNAH
